tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE TextualData (
    data_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    data_content TEXT,
    data_category STRING,
    research_topic STRING,
    researcher_id UUID REFERENCES Researchers(researcher_id)
);

CREATE TABLE studies (
    study_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    researcher_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES researchers(researcher_id)
);

CREATE TABLE documents (
    document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    content TEXT,
    study_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (study_id) REFERENCES studies(study_id)
);

CREATE TABLE analysis_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    document_id INT,
    analysis_date TIMESTAMP,
    result TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (document_id) REFERENCES documents(document_id)
);

CREATE TABLE studies (
 study_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 study_title VARCHAR(100),
 study_description TEXT,
 researcher_id INT,
 CONSTRAINT fk_researcher FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES researchers(researcher_id)
);

CREATE TABLE articles (
 article_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 article_title VARCHAR(100),
 article_content TEXT,
 study_id INT,
 CONSTRAINT fk_study FOREIGN KEY (study_id) REFERENCES studies(study_id)
);
